name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Anya reflects on the performance and asks for audience feedback.
Merch announcement section: Anya introduces the Birthday Celebration 2025 merchandise.
Introduction of the 'Acrylic Diorama Stand' merchandise.

subtitles.original: 震えてない 震えてない 震えてないみたい
subtitles.english: I'm not shaking, not shaking, not shaking at all

subtitles.original: 震えてないみたい Make up ちゃんと
subtitles.english: I'm not shaking at all, I'll do my makeup properly

subtitles.original: Hah! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Hah! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: That was so much fun!
subtitles.english: That was so much fun!

subtitles.english: I sang so many songs!

subtitles.original: ねー、いっぱい歌っちゃったね。
subtitles.english: Man, I really sang a lot.

subtitles.original: ゲストのみなさんたちともね、歌っちゃいましたけれども。
subtitles.english: I sang with all the guests too.

subtitles.original: みんなお気に入りとかある？どうだった？
subtitles.english: Does everyone have a favorite? How was it?

subtitles.original: How was it?
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: How was all the—how were all the performances?
subtitles.english: How was all the—how were all the performances?

subtitles.original: If you guys have any favorite, don't forget to post with the hashtag by the way,
subtitles.english: If you guys have any favorite, don't forget to post with the hashtag by the way,

subtitles.original: #CuriousTune3D!
subtitles.english: #CuriousTune3D!

subtitles.original: Tell me your favorite, or like, you know, memorable moments from the 3D birthday live.
subtitles.english: Tell me your favorite, or like, you know, memorable moments from the 3D birthday live.

subtitles.original: Yippee!
subtitles.english: Yippee!

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness! Now it's announcement time!
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness! Now it's announcement time!

subtitles.original: Ada ads ya guys, no skipping ads ya guys by the way.
subtitles.english: There are ads, guys, so no skipping ads, guys, by the way.

subtitles.original: Habis ini akan ada ads, jadi no skipping-skipping ya. Okay?
subtitles.english: There'll be ads after this, so no skipping, okay?

subtitles.original: Don't skip the ads, okay?
subtitles.english: Don't skip the ads, okay?

subtitles.original: Oh my god! The first one is...
subtitles.english: Oh my god! The first one is...

subtitles.original: Anya Melfissa Birthday Celebration 2025
subtitles.english: Anya Melfissa Birthday Celebration 2025

subtitles.original: Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Oh my god!

subtitles.original: 誕生日記念 2025年のグッズだってー！
subtitles.english: It's the 2025 birthday commemorative merch!

subtitles.original: The first one is... this beautiful, you know, this beautiful birthday merchandise.
subtitles.english: The first one is... this beautiful, you know, this beautiful birthday merchandise.

subtitles.original: Yes, that's right! We will be having 2025 merchandise, Anya Melfissa merchandise. Yippee!
subtitles.english: Yes, that's right! We will be having 2025 merchandise, Anya Melfissa merchandise. Yippee!

subtitles.original: Ada birthday 2025 merchandise, guys. Yippee!
subtitles.english: There's 2025 birthday merch, guys. Yippee!

subtitles.original: Ini art-nya, art-nya gila keren banget nggak sih, guys? Oh my god!
subtitles.english: The art, the art is crazy cool, isn't it guys? Oh my god!

subtitles.original: ねー、イラストめっちゃすごくない？ねー。
subtitles.english: Right? Isn't the illustration amazing? Right?

subtitles.original: こちらの素敵なグッズのキービジュアルはね、SOLANI先生が担当してくださいました。
subtitles.english: This lovely merch's key visual was done by SOLANI-sensei.

subtitles.original: すごく素敵なイラストで、私もお気に入りです。
subtitles.english: It's a really wonderful illustration, and it's one of my favorites.

subtitles.original: Aku suka banget sama illustration kali ini, gila keren banget, Anya banget nggak sih? Hmm.
subtitles.english: I really love this illustration, it's so cool and so very "Anya", isn't it? Hmm.

subtitles.original: ってことでね、Let's take a look at each item one by one, shall we?
subtitles.english: So, let's take a look at each item one by one, shall we?

subtitles.original: Let's look at them!
subtitles.english: Let's look at them!

subtitles.original: The first one is this...
subtitles.english: The first one is this...

subtitles.original: Rubber Mat
subtitles.english: Rubber Mat

subtitles.original: Rubber mat! Rubber mat with the key visual.
subtitles.english: Rubber mat! Rubber mat with the key visual.

subtitles.original: Rubber mat pakai key visual yang tadi ya guys. Yes, keren banget, oh my god!
subtitles.english: A rubber mat using the key visual from before, guys. Yes, it's so cool, oh my god!

subtitles.original: Keren banget, oh my god!
subtitles.english: It's so cool, oh my god!

subtitles.original: ねー、キービジュアルがプリントされたラバーマットです。
subtitles.english: Right, it's a rubber mat printed with the key visual.

subtitles.original: Ini bisa dipakai buat meja-meja nggak apa-apa, buat main apa ya?
subtitles.english: You can use this for your desk, or for playing... what was it?

subtitles.original: Buat main board game gitu juga nggak apa-apa.
subtitles.english: For playing board games and such, that's fine too.

subtitles.original: Terus buat main catur juga nggak apa-apa, dibuat tidur juga nggak apa-apa, guys.
subtitles.english: Then for playing chess is fine, even using it for sleeping is fine, guys.

subtitles.original: Ya terserah ya guys, dibuat tidur juga nggak apa-apa.
subtitles.english: Well, it's up to you guys, it's okay even for sleeping.

subtitles.original: Yeah, you can use this rubber mat anywhere you like, basically. Hmm.
subtitles.english: Yeah, you can use this rubber mat anywhere you like, basically. Hmm.

subtitles.original: And then, the next one...
subtitles.english: And then, the next one...

subtitles.original: The next merchandise...
subtitles.english: The next merchandise...

subtitles.original: Acrylic diorama stand! アクリルジオラマスタンドです。
subtitles.english: Acrylic diorama stand! It's an acrylic diorama stand.

subtitles.original: This isn't your usual acrylic stand, by the way.
subtitles.english: This isn't your usual acrylic stand, by the way.

subtitles.original: It's made with three layers for a more dynamic, three-dimensional look, guys. Oh my goodness!
subtitles.english: It's made with three layers for a more dynamic, three-dimensional look, guys. Oh my goodness!

subtitles.original: Ini bukan acrylic stand biasa, guys, ada tiga lapis yang bikin tampilannya kelihatan lebih hidup.
subtitles.english: This isn't just a regular acrylic stand, guys, it has three layers that make it look more alive.

subtitles.original: Kayak... kayak aku kan keris hidup ya guys. Cocok banget nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Like... like how I'm a living kris, right guys? Doesn't it fit perfectly?

subtitles.original: The illustration comes with a design frame, so it's perfect for display.
subtitles.english: The illustration comes with a design frame, so it's perfect for display.

subtitles.original: ねー、イラストにデザインフレームがついた、ディスプレイにぴったりの逸品です。
subtitles.english: Right, it's a piece with a design frame on the illustration, perfect for display.

subtitles.original: Cocok banget buat display pokoknya, guys.
subtitles.english: It's just perfect for display, guys.

subtitles.original: You can place it on your desk next to the rubber mat as well.
subtitles.english: You can place it on your desk next to the rubber mat as well.

subtitles.original: Taruh di meja kalian sama rubber mat yang tadi juga bisa.
subtitles.english: You can also put it on your desk along with that rubber mat.

subtitles.original: Terus, ya, dibuat—dimakan juga bisa, guys.
subtitles.english: Then, well, you could even... eat it, guys.

subtitles.original: Dimakan juga sebenarnya bisa, aduh... aduh ya...
subtitles.english: You actually could eat it too... Oh boy...

subtitles.original: Biasalah ya guys, adrenalin dari habis live, jadi ngomongnya aneh-aneh.
subtitles.english: It's normal guys, the adrenaline from finishing a live, so I'm saying weird things.

subtitles.original: Okay, the next merchandise... Shall we take a look at the next merchandise?
subtitles.english: Okay, the next merchandise... Shall we take a look at the next merchandise?

subtitles.original: So cute! Look at this! It's an acrylic keychain...
subtitles.english: So cute! Look at this! It's an acrylic keychain...

subtitles.original: ...of general outfit Anya.
subtitles.english: ...of general outfit Anya.

subtitles.original: 通常衣装のアクリルキーホルダーです。めっちゃ可愛くない？
subtitles.english: It's an acrylic keychain of my regular outfit. Isn't it super cute?

subtitles.original: Yeah, me in my regular outfit. So cute. Mini Anya.
subtitles.english: Yeah, me in my regular outfit. So cute. Mini Anya.

subtitles.original: You can take it anywhere, guys. Oh my god! On your bag...
subtitles.english: You can take it anywhere, guys. Oh my god! On your bag...

subtitles.original: Di tas juga bisa. Terus di apa lagi ya? Di dompet juga bisa.
subtitles.english: You can put it on your bag. And where else? On your wallet too.
